Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory8.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Although many parts of its structure are damaged, I can still feel the sense of sanctity when standing on the faded carpet like this...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'During worships, people will gather here for important matters, and music will start playing...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Liv, don't forget our mission.", 3: '7', 4: 'I also like that feeling.', 5: '8'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm sorry... I was lost in my thoughts again. We're collecting building materials for the base, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Isn't it nice when time passes in peace and quiet, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's save the chatting for after we finish our mission.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Commandant, please help check out what we can bring back as well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'There seems to be a projector split into two in the middle of the church...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Can you fix it, Lee?', 3: '15', 4: 'Can we find out what it was projecting?', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Bring it over first.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Videos of sermons, probably. This kind of device is pretty common before the outbreak, according to our database.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Huh... This wasn't shattered into two. It was designed to work only when the two parts come together.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It'll probably work if you match them here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Edward', 3: 'My name is Edward.'}
{2: 'Julie', 3: 'My name is Julie.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...Is this a recording from the past?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Edward', 3: 'If this is playing, it means someone has found our projection device.'}
{2: 'Edward', 3: 'What does the world look like now? Are there still Corrupted here?'}
{2: 'Julie', 3: 'Whoever this is that has found us, are you human? Or are you a Corrupted... or maybe something else entirely?'}
{2: 'Edward & Julie', 3: "Whichever it is, there's something we want to ask you."}
{2: 'Edward & Julie', 3: 'Will you please host a wedding for us?'}
